column5: I have done ok in past years casting mr. Twister's on jigs above the dam In dunville. But its always so crowded.  Where would be the best place to target them from a canoe in that reigon?  Above the dam or below?  Any tips would be much apprecated. Im taking my 15 year old cousin out with me who lost his father a few years back... My uncle wayne tought me to fish when i was a kid...he won a few lake O samon tourneys back in the day....ive only ever consistently caught them up on the french and lets be honest in the  early fall thats like shooting fish in a barrel.  I just want to put him on fish if at all possible. Thanks in advance pm. Me if thats better.....
Sorry for the spelling im on my bb.
.......I will trade a secret brookie spot..........
trade deadline is over. lol thanks for helping a walter rookie out you two. PM'S sent
